Package server

Class Communicator

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
server.Communicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, RemoteBook, RemoteLibrarian, RemoteLibraryUser, RemoteLoanBook, RemoteLoanMagazine, RemoteMagazine
public class Communicator extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteBook, RemoteMagazine, RemoteLibrarian, RemoteLibraryUser, RemoteLoanBook, RemoteLoanMagazine
Public communicator class communicating between module Server package server with Shared side of the application. Implementing all interfaces from Shared module, server package: RemoteBook, RemoteMagazine, RemoteLibrarian, RemoteLibraryUser,RemoteLoanBook,RemoteLoanMagazine The class is also extending UnicastRemoteObject.
See Also:
